item.title: How to install Nginx on Ubuntu 20.04
item.description: Introduction In this tutorial I’m going to cover how to install Nginx on an Ubuntu 20.04 server. item.title: Setup Ubuntu 20.04
item.description: Introduction In this tutorial you will learn how to setup an Ubuntu server. This includes how to create a non-root user, enable SSH login, disable root login and enable a rudimentary firewall.
